response.original_title: Meekz - Mini Me's Directed by KC Locke
response.overview: "The first half of the epic five-minute video features dizzying motion control work by G6Mocco, with Meekz scornfully taunting the plagiarists around him while floating and spinning through the air in a chair fixed to a massive robotic camera control rig, riding the machine like heâ€™s at an amusement park. The stunning gyrating black rig becomes a major co-star of the video. The second half of the video presents Meekz in a wild doomsday world with blazing effects created by VFX studio LMNTL.  "
response.title: Meekz - Mini Me's Directed by KC Locke
